Discussing the workforce issues the NHS continues to face, @PRCSEd says "We have to make working in the NHS a joy and a privilege. The NHS needs to generate that community spirit. At the moment, that community spirit is not there. It has been eroded by targets."

"Diagnostic hubs are fantastic and it's great that these are being rolled out. It is going to really make a difference, but it can only make a difference if we have the workforce to run them. We do not have this at the moment." @PRCSEd.
"It cannot happen again." says @PRCSEd, discussing the interruption to cancer services which took place during the first wave of COVID-19, at today's Health and Social Care Select Committee session.
Our President Professor Michael Griffin has been giving evidence to @CommonsHealth this morning as part of their inquiry into cancer services.
